result.reason: Feature request for smart/virtual connection groups (Connected, Recent) inspired by RDCMan — useful for large connection sets, requires new virtual folder nodes in the connection tree.
result.approach: Add virtual/smart group nodes (Connected, Recent) to ConnectionTreeModel that dynamically populate based on active connections and connection history. Track recent connections via a bounded list in ConnectionInfo or a new RecentConnectionsManager. Display these as read-only virtual folders in the ConnectionTreeWindow, separate from the user's saved tree. No persistence needed for Connected group (runtime only); Recent group needs a small history store (last N connections with timestamps).
